name: The New Archies
overview: The New Archies is a children's television cartoon, based upon the long-running Archie comic books and characters. The series, produced by DIC Entertainment and originally airing on NBC, re-imagined Archie Andrews, Betty Cooper, Veronica Lodge, Jughead Jones, Reggie Mantle, and the other teenage students of Riverdale High School as pre-teens in junior high. Thirteen episodes of the show were produced, which all aired during the show's first and only season in 1987 and were repeated in 1989. A short-lived Archie Comics series was produced bearing the same title and set in the same universe as the animated series. Reruns of the series ran on The Family Channel's Saturday morning lineup, 1991 to 1993 and on Toon Disney from 1998 to 2002.

episodes.name: The Last Laugh / Thief! (Of Hearts)
episodes.overview:
The Last Laugh: Reggie plays tricks on Fangs Foherty during a school gym competition. When Fangs asks Reggie to ask Veronica to go to the dance with him, Reggie impersonates Veronica.

Thief of Hearts: After seeing Sugar Slayde, Archie, Jughead, Reggie, and Eugene compete against Veronica, Betty, and Amani in a competition to solve a mystery. But their discoveries all lead to Mr. Weatherbee.

episodes.name: I Got To Be Me, Or Is It You? / Sir Jughead Jones
Future Shock / Stealing The Show
episodes.overview:
FUTURE SHOCK: At a summer function, two children are to be crowned king and queen -- the nominees? Archie and Veronica; Reggie and Betty. All is well until it's revealed that almost all former winners have gone on to marry, and suddenly the gang's dreams are full of unpleasant fantasies of the future.

STEALING THE SHOW: When Betty wins the lead in a school play, a rock opera version of Cinderella, Veronica will stop at nothing until she is the star of the show...and Reggie is more than willing to help her achieve this goal.

episodes.name: Red To The Rescue / Jughead The Jinx
Telegraph, Telephone, Tell Reggie / Wooden It Be Loverly
episodes.overview:
TELEGRAPH, TELEPHONE, TELL REGGIE: Tired of Reggie being so mean, the gang decides to try and win him over with kindness by throwing him a party. But with everybody acting so strangely around Reggie, he gets the gist of secret plans that don't involve him, and seeks to ruin their fun.

WOODEN IT BE LOVERLY: The gang is devastated when the old tree which houses their clubhouse is threatened to be destroyed, and set about trying to save it. They run into difficulties, however, when all their plans of attack are mysteriously thwarted by a secret opposition.

episodes.name: I Was A 12 Year Old Werewolf / The Prince Of Riverdale
Loose Lips Stops Slips / A Change Of Minds
Incredible Shrinking Archie / Gunk For Gold
Jughead's Millions / Making Of Mr. Righteous
Take My Butler, Please / Horray For Hollywood
